tool.name: users
tool.command:
parsec users get_users
## UNKNOWN deleted #if $f_email: --f_email "$f_email" #end if #if $f_name: --f_name "$f_name" #end if #if $f_any: --f_any "$f_any" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: f_email
param.label: F Email
param.help: filter for user emails. The filter will be active for non-admin users only if the Galaxy instance has the ``expose_user_email`` option set to ``True`` in the ``config/galaxy.ini`` configuration file. This parameter is silently ignored for non-admin users in Galaxy ``release_15.01`` and earlier.

param.name: f_name
param.label: F Name
param.help: filter for user names. The filter will be active for non-admin users only if the Galaxy instance has the ``expose_user_name`` option set to ``True`` in the ``config/galaxy.ini`` configuration file. This parameter is silently ignored in Galaxy ``release_15.10`` and earlier.

param.name: f_any
param.label: F Any
param.help: filter for user email or name. Each filter will be active for non-admin users only if the Galaxy instance has the corresponding ``expose_user_*`` option set to ``True`` in the ``config/galaxy.ini`` configuration file. This parameter is silently ignored in Galaxy ``release_15.10`` and earlier.

tool.help: Get a list of all registered users. If ``deleted`` is set to ``True``, get a list of deleted users.
